channel.title: Change the default tansparent colour of your clients background
channel.description: Ive got a custom client loading screen, when images load on theres a white line around them, this is because the clients background sees white as default transparent colour and my images fade into a white background, how can i change this. Im not very good in photoshop so if i upload the images can someone crop them, so there is no white on any of the layers?

item.title: Change the default tansparent colour of your clients background
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

Ive got a custom client loading screen, when images load on theres a white line around them, this is because the clients background sees white as default transparent colour and my images fade into a white background, how can i change this. Im not very good in photoshop so if i upload the images can someone crop them, so there is no white on any of the layers?
